wikipedia_page.main: Fionn Griffiths (born 27 of August 1982, Shrewsbury, Shropshire) is a female British downhill mountain bike rider. She has won the 4X World Cup with the all female team, Team GR back in 2011 and came fifth in the UCI (Union Cycliste Internationale) Elite Team standings. Also in her achievements she is a two time world cup champion, two time world championship silver medallist and a five time UK national champion in her discipline. As of 2019 she is the holder of 57x UCI World Cup Podiums.
